details:
cve@mitre.org reports:

> FastCGI fcgi2 (aka fcgi) 2.x through 2.4.4 has an integer
> overflow (and resultant heap-based buffer overflow) via
> crafted nameLen or valueLen values in data to the IPC socket.
> This occurs in ReadParams in fcgiapp.c.
summary: fcgi -- Heap-based buffer overflow via crafted nameLen/valueLen in ReadParams
